title: Talking about Aboriginal art
creator_credit: Chris Willing, David Roberts, Peter Lipscombe and Sydney University Television Services
brief_description: Four programmes, resulting from a series of forums, “Aboriginal art in Australian society”, held at the Art Gallery of New South Wales and the Powerhouse Museum, Sydney 1990.
